conclusion: Conclusion: The overall reaction from the audience was BAD with an average of 3.05 stars. The feedback was below average, indicating that the content did not fully meet audience expectations.

comments_analysis.comment:
UPDATE: Charles Leclerc, Lewis Hamilton and Pierre Gasly are all disqualified from the Chinese Grand Prix. Leclerc and Gasly were found to have underweight cars in post-race checks, while Hamilton had too much wear on his skid block.

The disqualifications promote Lance Stroll and Carlos Sainz to the points.
